note:
As a learning consultant, I’m interested in learning that makes a difference – and in particular, learning solutions that are at least partly digital. I’m interested in all things digital, and how they might relate to learning: quite a broad range covering anything from VR to data, to AI, and more.

I’m also fascinated by what makes us human – how we think, feel, behave, and believe.

Oh, and I like books (scifi and fantasy mainly).
